patthana15.26:4.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.26:5.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.26:6.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
